fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- 3 Days after your death, the night before the following day, you get the choice to be revived and enter town with Invincible Defense and a permanent extra vote. (1 use)
- If you decline, you will continue to get the choice each night afterwards.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you die from lynching, all Town Roles are Roleblocked the following night due to guilt.
- Players that attempt to attack you at night after reviving are Roleblocked the following night.
- If it is only you versus one evil faction/player, you lose your Invincible Defense. You are informed of this.
